column1: Question
Who was William Riker's Father?
What legendary forest was Worf in when he told Q he was not a "merry man"?
Which Enterprise officer was almost collected by Kivas Fajo?
Which two houses began a Klingon civil war?
How was Geordi LaForge able to uncover cloaked Romulan ships?
Which officer did Picard put in Command of the USS Sutherland (to the dismay of its first officer)
Which comedienne, and singing nun, joined the Enterprise D crew as the El Aurian Bartender, Guinan?
Which colony's destruction lead to the Battle of Wolf 359?
What name did Cmdr. Riker's transporter duplicate take for himself?
Who is the guardian of the Klingon Underworld?
What disease affected Ambassador Sarek, leading to lost control of his emotions?
Geordi La Forge built a sailing ship model of which ship for a former captain?
Who did Data call "Brother"?
Where was the Enterprise when the Cytherian probe attempted to take over the computer?
The Eternal being in the form of Douwd Uxbridge accidentally annhilated which species?
This Romulan spy, posing as a Vulcan ambassador, was NOT killd in a transporter incident
The Enterprise-D encountered what dark matter nebula?
Tyken's Rift trapped which Starfleet vessel?
T/F: The Enterprise-D is a Galor class ship
This time traveler was not from the future, as he claimed, but instead the past?
Hugh, influenced by Lore, ended up attakcing what planet?
Wesley Crusher teams up with what entity, setting us up for the spinoff we never received?
In Q's Anti-time future, the Klingons have conquered which Beta Quadrant Empire?
This syndrome is caused by an abnormality in Picard's Parietal lobe, and affects him in "All Good things…"?
Which Picard commanded the USS Pasteur?
